title: Going Mad: Traveling for Your Basketball Team
description: March Madness is approaching and our team is sharing everything you should know to make your 2020 experience a slam dunk! Big Ten Network Analyst and 20-year hoops expert Mike DeCourcy joins our squad in this episode and reflects on his favorite memories. Send your travel stories to podcast@expedia.com or find us on Twitter, Facebook, and Instagram @Expedia!
